post.text: Tomorrow caps an amazing journey, but the work we have to do is just beginning. What I've seen these past 17 months makes it clear to me that we're up to the challenge, because we truly are stronger together.

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: Yes she's been so classy. She's labeled her opponents supporters as "deplorables", and said her biggest enemies are Republicans. Yeah, she'll bring everyone together. Okay. Even if she's elected she'll never by my president. Our country won't be safe either.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Not angry at all but thanks for the lovely reading material Breanna

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: And if I'm not for Hillary I'm automatically a Trump fan? Wow. How do you know who I voted for in the primaries? You folks think you know everyone. Time to wake up because the majority of the time you're wrong. Have fun labeling :-)
